sources.name: AzureSqlTable3
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSqlTable3

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared AzureSqlTable3 = let AdfDoc = Sql.Database("azure-sql-storage1.database.windows.net", "AdventureWorks2022", [CreateNavigationProperties = false]), InputTable = AdfDoc{[Schema="Production",Item="Product"]}[Data] in InputTable;
shared UserQuery = let Source = #"AzureSqlTable3",
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Source, each ([FinishedGoodsFlag] = true) and ([MakeFlag] = false)),
  #"Sorted rows" = Table.Sort(#"Filtered rows", {{"ProductNumber", Order.Ascending}}),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Sorted rows", each ([Color] <> null) and ([Size] <> null)),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows 1", {"SizeUnitMeasureCode", "WeightUnitMeasureCode", "Weight", "DaysToManufacture", "Class"}),
  #"Filtered rows 2" = Table.SelectRows(#"Removed columns", each ([SellEndDate] <> null)),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows 2", {"rowguid", "DiscontinuedDate"}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns 1", "Custom", each [SellEndDate] - [SellStartDate]),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Added custom", {{"Custom", "Total Days"}}),
  #"Removed columns 2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"Total Days"}),
  #"Added custom 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns 2", "Profit", each [ListPrice] - [StandardCost]), {{"Profit", Currency.Type}}) in #"Added custom 1";

source.sqlReaderQuery: select distinct id from [dbo].[webcontent] where id<6
select distinct country from [dbo].[tot_sales] where country<>'USA'
